channel.title: How do i make a new server?
channel.description: ty if u help me ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 02:10:47 PM[/size][hr]lolz how do i make my own sever could u plz tell me how to start ty if its over a day pm me k?

item.title: How do i make a new server?
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“InternalorExternalCommand, post:8, topic:93492”]Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Then download Hamachi to get onto servers(Unless they are no-ip servers)

Hamachi here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

For hamachi go here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

After thats downloaded click Create or join networks.

For creatng a network you should be the one running the server.

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
!TestScape!

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

If your looking to join a server.

[ul][li]Make sure you have typed in the right IP and port[/li]
[li]Make sure if the server requires hamachi you have it downloaded and read above what to do.[/li][/ul]

If you have moparscape 3.2 downloaded

Go to

[ul][li]File[/li]
[li]New Port[/li]
[li]Type in the port for the server[/li]
[li]Make sure your Server’s ip is right.[/li][/ul][/quote]just folllow this or look and u can mabe fine it in others pleace

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new server?

item.title: How do i make a new server?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go download Moparscape 3.2. Here -->http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Then download Hamachi to get onto servers(Unless they are no-ip servers)

Hamachi here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

For hamachi go here --> http://www.hamachi.cc/

After thats downloaded click Create or join networks.

For creatng a network you should be the one running the server.

Enter the name of networks that relates to your servers name.
Example
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

For joining a server’s hamachi network. “Join Network”

Then enter the Hamachi name that it tells you.

Enter the password it says.

Example
!TestScape!

Hamachi Networks
Testscape1
Testscape2
Testscape3

Pass- test

If your looking to join a server.

[ul][li]Make sure you have typed in the right IP and port[/li]
[li]Make sure if the server requires hamachi you have it downloaded and read above what to do.[/li][/ul]

If you have moparscape 3.2 downloaded

Go to

[ul][li]File[/li]
[li]New Port[/li]
[li]Type in the port for the server[/li]
[li]Make sure your Server’s ip is right.[/li][/ul]
